product_overview: Web ERP for small/medium retailers (sanitarios, ferreterías, corralones) that centralizes product/catalog management, unified sales (cotizaciones/remitos/factura), cash register workflows and PDF reporting. It integrates Google OAuth for auth, Excel import for bulk price updates, and tools for inventory replenishment.
core_goals: Provide a single, efficient UI to manage products, clients, suppliers, categories, sales and inventory with PDF exports.
Secure authentication and session management via Google OAuth with token refresh to protect business data.
Enable fast bulk operations (Excel imports, mass price updates) and accurate price calculations using supplier chain discounts.
Support daily cash register lifecycle (open/movements/close) with reconciliation and auto-generated PDF summary.
Offer reliable purchase order workflows and printable inventory-count planillas to streamline stock replenishment.

features.name: Google OAuth Login
features.description: Single-button Google login that redirects to backend OAuth flow and persists tokens on callback to allow authenticated usage.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Click "Continuar con Google" button -> Browser redirects to Google consent screen -> Complete Google consent -> Land on /auth/callback with tokens in URL params -> Auth callback persists tokens to auth store -> Redirect to / and see dashboard
Navigate to /login -> Click "Continuar con Google" button -> User cancels on Google consent screen -> Return to /login (no tokens) -> See error toast or remain on login

features.name: Dashboard KPIs
features.description: Authenticated landing page that shows KPI cards (total products, total clients, low-stock count, inventory value), stock alert panel and quick-action shortcuts.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> After login, see 4 KPI cards and stock alert panel -> Click quick-action shortcut 'New Sale' -> Navigate to /sales
Navigate to / -> Dashboard API call fails (500) -> KPI cards show placeholder values or error state -> See toast error 'No se pudo cargar resumen'

features.name: Product CRUD
features.description: Manage product catalog: search, filter, create and edit products via modal with live price breakdown and supplier-driven chain discounts.
user_flows: Navigate to /products -> Search products by entering product code in search input -> Click "Nuevo Producto" -> Fill product form fields (codigo, descripcion, precio_lista, bonificacion_1, categoria, proveedor) -> Click Save -> See created product listed in table

Navigate to /products -> Click edit icon on an existing product row -> Modify precio_lista and bonificaciones -> Click Save -> API returns validation error -> See field-level validation messages and cannot save

features.name: Excel Import Products
features.description: Two-step .xlsx import: upload file, preview mapped rows (new vs updated), then confirm batched import with progress feedback.
user_flows: Navigate to /products -> Click "Importar" -> Choose .xlsx file in file picker -> See preview modal showing new and updated rows -> Click "Confirmar Importación" -> Observe progress bar for batched uploads -> See toast 'Importación completada' and updated products in list
Navigate to /products -> Click "Importar" -> Choose invalid file type (.txt) -> See immediate file validation error in modal -> Cancel import and remain on /products

features.name: Sales Voucher Creation
features.description: Unified sales screen for creating cotizaciones, remitos or facturas: select voucher type, choose client, add products via quick search, set payment methods and generate PDF/emit voucher.
user_flows: Navigate to /sales -> Select voucher type 'Factura' from type selector -> Search and select a client using the client autocomplete -> Search product by code and add product to cart -> Edit quantity and per-item discount in cart row -> Select payment method and enter amounts -> Click "Generar" -> Confirm generation -> See PDF modal with voucher and Download button

Navigate to /sales -> Build voucher with items and click "Generar" -> System detects there is no open cash (cash required) -> Modal 'No hay caja abierta' appears -> Click 'Abrir y Continuar' -> Enter opening amount -> Confirm -> Cash opens and sales flow resumes

features.name: Client CRUD
features.description: Paginated client list with search, quick-create and edit modals that include full address and tax condition fields and show account balance in the list.
user_flows: Navigate to /clients -> Search clients by name or document number -> Click "Nuevo cliente" -> Fill client form fields (razon social, cuit/dni, condicion_iva, direccion, telefono, email) -> Click Save -> See new client appear in list with account balance column
Navigate to /clients -> Click trash/delete icon on a client row -> Click does nothing (no handler wired) -> User sees no reaction and client is not deleted

features.name: Supplier CRUD
features.description: Manage suppliers with a three-tab modal (General, Commercial conditions with chain discounts, Categories multi-select). Supports hard delete with confirmation.
user_flows: Navigate to /suppliers -> Click "Nuevo Proveedor" -> Fill 3-tab form: General (razon social, CUIT), Commercial conditions (bonificaciones), Categories -> Click Save -> See supplier in list
Navigate to /suppliers -> Click trash icon on supplier row -> Confirm deletion in dialog -> API deletes supplier -> Supplier removed from list
Navigate to /suppliers -> Click trash icon on supplier row -> Confirm deletion -> API returns 500 -> See toast error 'No se pudo eliminar el proveedor' and supplier remains listed

features.name: Category CRUD
features.description: Manage product categories in a simple list with search, create/edit modal and delete confirmation.
user_flows: Navigate to /categories -> Search categories by name -> Click "Nueva Categoría" -> Fill name and description -> Click Save -> See new category in list
Navigate to /categories -> Click delete/trash icon on a category -> Confirm deletion in dialog -> API returns success -> Category removed from list

features.name: Cash Register
features.description: Daily cash register lifecycle: open a cash with opening amount, record income/expense movements, and close with physical cash reconciliation and auto-generated PDF summary.
user_flows: Navigate to /caja -> If no cash open, enter opening amount in the centered card -> Click "Abrir Caja" -> Cash opens and header shows opening time and amount -> Register an income: Click "+ Ingreso" -> Fill description, amount and method -> Click Confirm -> Movement appears in table -> Click "Cerrar Caja" -> Enter efectivo físico contado -> If difference = 0 click "Confirmar Cierre" -> PDF is generated and downloaded -> See toast 'Caja cerrada exitosamente' and page shows 'Sin caja abierta' card

Navigate to /caja -> Cash is open -> Click "Cerrar Caja" -> Enter efectivo físico counted that differs from expected -> Leave Motivo field empty -> Observe 'Confirmar Cierre' button disabled and field-level validation message for motivo

features.name: Inventory Purchase Orders
features.description: Manage purchase orders for stock replenishment: generate planilla de conteo, load counted stock, calculate differences, create draft orders and confirm with PDF download.
user_flows: Navigate to /inventory -> Filter orders by supplier or category -> Click "Nueva Orden de Pedido" -> Select supplier or category filter in modal and generate planilla -> Fill counted stock per product -> Review suggested quantities to order -> Click "Confirmar Orden" -> Order created and listed -> Click PDF icon to download order

Navigate to /inventory -> Open a DRAFT order -> Click checkmark to confirm -> API returns conflict (order already confirmed externally) -> Show toast 'No se pudo confirmar: estado inválido' and order remains in DRAFT view

features.name: Voucher History
features.description: List and filter vouchers (comprobantes) with PDF view/download, soft delete with mandatory reason and pagination.
user_flows: Navigate to /comprobantes -> Use search input to search voucher number -> Filter by voucher type and status -> Click eye icon on a voucher row -> PDF modal opens with preview -> Click Download to save PDF

Navigate to /comprobantes -> Click trash icon on an invoice row -> Enter reason in confirm dialog -> Click Confirm -> API soft-deletes the voucher and it disappears from active list (or marked deleted)

features.name: Dark Light Theme Toggle
features.description: Header toggle to switch between dark and light themes; preference persisted to localStorage and applied on html element.
user_flows: Navigate to any authenticated route -> Click theme toggle button in Header -> UI toggles to dark mode immediately and 'dark' class applied to html -> Preference persisted to localStorage

Navigate to any route -> Click theme toggle to change preference -> Browser in private mode blocks localStorage writes -> Toggle appears to change visually but on reload the theme reverts to system preference

features.name: Business Settings
features.description: Edit business identity and fiscal data (name, CUIT, tax condition, address, phone, email, sale point number) from the settings page.
user_flows: Navigate to /settings -> Edit business name, CUIT and address fields -> Click "Guardar datos del negocio" -> API returns success -> See toast 'Datos guardados' and values persist

Navigate to /settings -> Click logo upload control and choose image -> Control has no handler implemented -> Nothing happens (logo unchanged) -> Click "Guardar datos del negocio" -> Other fields save but logo remains unchanged

routes.description: Public login page with Google OAuth button
OAuth redirect landing page, reads tokens from URL params
Main dashboard with KPI cards and quick actions
Unified sales screen for creating quotations, receipts and invoices
Product catalog management with Excel import/export
Bulk price update tool with draft support
Client management with account balance display
Voucher history with PDF download and credit notes
Purchase order management for stock replenishment
Reports index page (currently a UI placeholder)
Business configuration and ARCA/AFIP electronic invoicing setup

features.name: Google OAuth Login
features.description: Single-button login that redirects to Google OAuth via the backend. On return, the callback page extracts tokens from URL params and persists them in Zustand store.
user_interactions: Navigate to /login
Click "Continuar con Google" button
Return from Google OAuth callback
Get redirected to dashboard

features.name: Dashboard KPIs
features.description: Displays 4 KPI cards (total products, total clients, low-stock count, inventory value), a stock alert panel and 4 quick-action buttons.
user_interactions: View KPI cards after login
Click quick-action shortcuts (New Sale, Add Product, New Client, Reports)

features.name: Product CRUD
features.description: Full product lifecycle management. Create/edit via modal with live price breakdown calculator. Supplier selection auto-fills chain discounts.
user_interactions: Search products by code or description
Filter by category or supplier
Click "Nuevo Producto" and fill form, then save
Click edit icon on a product, modify fields, then save
Paginate results

features.name: Excel Import Products
features.description: Two-step import workflow. Upload .xlsx file, review preview of new/updated products, then confirm. Batched in groups of 50 with progress bar.
user_interactions: Click "Importar" and choose .xlsx file
Review preview modal showing new and updated rows
Click "Confirmar Importación" and watch progress bar

features.name: Sales Voucher Creation
features.description: Unified sales screen. Select voucher type, search/select client, add products via keyboard-driven search, set payment methods, confirm and view PDF.
user_interactions: Select voucher type (Cotización / Remito / Factura)
Search and select a client
Search and add products to cart
Edit cart rows (quantity and per-item discount)
Set payment method and amount
Click "Generar" and confirm
View and download PDF in modal

features.name: Client CRUD
features.description: Paginated client list with search, create and edit modal with full address and tax condition fields.
user_interactions: Search clients by name or document number
Click "Nuevo cliente" and fill form, then save
Click edit icon, modify fields, then save
View account balance in the list

features.name: Supplier CRUD
features.description: Supplier management with three-tab modal (General, Commercial conditions with chain discounts, Categories multi-select). Hard delete with confirmation.
user_interactions: Search suppliers
Click "Nuevo Proveedor" and fill 3-tab form, then save
Click edit icon, modify fields, then save
Click trash icon and confirm deletion

features.name: Category CRUD
features.description: Flat category list with search, simple name+description modal, delete with confirmation dialog.
user_interactions: Search categories by name
Click "Nueva Categoría" and fill name and description, then save
Click edit icon, modify, then save
Click trash icon and confirm deletion

features.name: Cash Register
features.description: Daily cash register state machine. Open cash, record income/expense movements, close cash with physical count reconciliation, auto-generate PDF.
user_interactions: Click "Abrir Caja" and enter opening amount, then confirm
View movements table in real time
Click "+ Ingreso" and enter details, then confirm
Click "- Egreso" and enter details, then confirm
Click "Cerrar Caja" and enter physical cash count (and reason if mismatch), then confirm

features.name: Inventory Purchase Orders
features.description: Purchase order management for stock replenishment. Create orders with physical count vs system stock comparison, confirm or delete draft orders, download PDF.
user_interactions: Filter orders by supplier, category, or status
Click "Nueva Orden de Pedido" and fill modal, then confirm
Click eye icon to view order detail
Click PDF icon to download order
Click checkmark to confirm a draft order
Click trash icon to delete a draft order

features.name: Voucher History
features.description: Paginated voucher list with type and status filters. View/download PDFs, create credit notes for invoices with CAE, soft delete with reason.
user_interactions: Search by voucher number
Filter by voucher type and status
Click eye icon to view PDF
Click download icon to download PDF
Click trash icon and enter reason to delete
Paginate results

features.name: Dark Light Theme Toggle
features.description: Theme preference persisted to localStorage. Toggles dark class on html element. Defaults to system preference.
user_interactions: Click theme toggle button in Header
See UI switch between light and dark mode

features.name: Business Settings
features.description: Edit business name, CUIT, tax condition, address, phone, email and sale point number.
user_interactions: Edit any business data field
Click "Guardar datos del negocio" to save

known_limitations.issue: Delete button on products table has no onClick handler wired
Delete button on clients table has no onClick handler wired
JWT tokens stored in localStorage via Zustand persist middleware instead of memory only
known_limitations.impact: Security concern, tokens exposed to XSS

known_limitations.issue: Reports page is entirely static with no API calls wired
known_limitations.impact: No reports can be generated from this page

known_limitations.issue: IVA is hardcoded at 21% in sales screen ignoring per-product iva_rate
known_limitations.impact: Wrong totals for products with 10.5% or 27% IVA

known_limitations.issue: Product and client search in sales page loads only first 100 records
known_limitations.impact: Businesses with more than 100 products or clients will have truncated search

known_limitations.issue: Logo upload in Settings has no handler implemented
Notification checkboxes in Settings are not persisted to API
